name: grotto (brendan roarty)
description:
Take your watering can all the way up an old tower to water a flower. Scale impossible structures, befriend birds, and find good fruit. 

Controls

  • Move - Left Stick /  WASD
  • Camera - Right Stick / Arrows
  • Jump / Pickup Item - South Button / Space
  • Climb - HOLD Right Trigger / Left Shift
  • Cycle Inventory into Hand - Right Button / F 
  • Drop Item in Hand - Left Button  / E
  • Pause - Start / Escape

Very Important Movement Options

  • While climbing, if you jump while holding up you will do a climbing jump up.
  • In any state while looking at a wall, you will do a wall jump. 
  • These can be combined in order  to get a lot of height.

This was created over the course of a week and a half ~10 days for the Great Spring Jam hosted by Firith Studios check em out they are pretty sweet. 

I made everything from scratch during the time, besides some bits and bobs of code, and the rain and hawk sound fx, which I got from freesound.org. 

Hope you enjoy the game!
